channel.title: Galaxy of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the galaxy of the day.

item.title: Galaxy X (galaxy)
item.description: Galaxy X is a postulated dark satellite dwarf galaxy of the Milky Way Galaxy. If it exists, it would be composed mostly of dark matter and interstellar gas with few stars. Its proposed location is some 90 kpc (290 kly) from the Sun, behind the disk of the Milky Way, and some 12 kpc (39 kly) in extent. Galactic coordinates would be (l= -27.4°,b=-1.08°).
